task_description:
Update the custom page UI for Evolution API branding and new form fields.

## Update: src/custom-page/custom-page.controller.ts

### Update generateCustomPageHTML() method:

1. Rebrand from GREEN-API to Evolution API:
   - Change title from "WhatsApp Integration - GREEN-API" to "WhatsApp Integration - Evolution API"
   - Update header text from "GREEN-API" to "Evolution API"
   - Change color scheme from green (#3B9702) to Evolution API blue (#0d9488 or similar teal)
   - Remove or replace the GREEN-API logo SVG with a simple WhatsApp icon or Evolution text logo

2. Update the "Add New Instance" form fields:
   
   Remove:
   - Instance ID (numeric input)
   - API Token input
   
   Add:
   - Instance Name (text input, placeholder: "e.g., my-whatsapp-instance")
   - Evolution API URL (text input, placeholder: "e.g., https://evolution.yourdomain.com")
   - API Key (password input, placeholder: "Your Evolution API global key")

3. Update form submission payload:
   Change from: { locationId, instanceId, apiToken, name }
   To: { locationId, instanceName, evolutionApiUrl, evolutionApiKey, name }

4. Update instance card display:
   - Show instanceName instead of numeric ID
   - Show evolutionApiUrl 
   - Show connection state (open/close/connecting)
   - Remove "Open Console" button (was GREEN-API specific)

5. Update the decryptUserData endpoint response handling if needed

Keep all GHL OAuth and context handling logic unchanged - only update the UI and form fields.
